actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Small Business.

actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on SBA & SBIC Authority, Minority Enterprise, and General Small Business Problems.

actions.in_subcommittee: SBA & SBIC Authority, Minority Enterprise, and General Small Business Problems

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on SBA and SBIC Authority, Minority Enterprise, and General Small Business

official_title: A bill to amend Section 16 of the Small Business Act.

summary.text: Amends the Small Business Act to increase the fine from $5,000 to $50,000 and the term of imprisonment from two years to five years for individuals who overvalue any security or make false statements to the United States (currently to the Small Business Administration) for the purpose of obtaining a loan, contract, or subcontract under such Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend Section 16 of the Small Business Act.
